Name: UCSB
Description: A great university located along the California coast!

Name: Kamehameha Kapalama Campus
Description: A Hawaiian school consisting of elementary, middle, and high school founded by Princess Bernice Pauahi Bishop to provide education for Hawaiians (children with Hawaiian blood).

Name: Maili Beach Park
Description: A beach on O_ahu, Hawai_i where my family would have Samoan family reunion camping trips.

Name: Kahoolawe
Description: The smallest of the eight main Hawaiian islands that was used as a bombing range by the U.S. Military, which is now being cleaned up and protected.

Name: Mauna Kea
Description: A dormant volcano on Hawai_i island, which is a sacred site to Hawaiians. It is currently a site of protest and protection by Hawaiians and supporters against the building of the Thirty Meter Telescope.

Name: Haleiwa
Description: A town on the North Shore of O_ahu with great beaches and good local food that my family and I adventure to often.
